item.title: Don’t get bitter, get better. - Tiger Woods
There’s no way around hard work. Embrace it. You have to put in the hours because there is always something you can improve on. - Roger Federer
Gold medals aren’t really made of gold. They’re made of sweat, determination, and a hard-to-find alloy called guts. - Dan Gable
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take” and “A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be. - Wayne Gretzky
Pressure is something you feel when you don’t know what the hell you’re doing. - Peyton Manning
Pressure is a Privilege - Virgil van Dijk
Dreams are free. Goals have a cost. While you can daydream for free, goals don’t come without a price. Time, Effort, Sacrifice, and Sweat. How will you pay for your goals? - Usain Bolt
I can only control my performance. If I do my best, then I can feel good at the end of the day. - Michael Phelps

Preparation is everything and focus is the key. It’s easy to say you gave it your all out on the pitch. But the point is if you’d prepared you’d have had more to give and you’ve played better. - Eric Cantona
The harder I work, the luckier I get. - Gary Player
Hard work beats talent when talent fails to work hard. - Kevin Durant
I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can’t accept not trying. - Michael Jordan
Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records. - William Arthur Ward
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up. - Vince Lombardi
Sweat plus sacrifice equals success. - Charles Finley
Today I will do what others won’t, so tomorrow I can do what others can’t. - Jerry Rice
The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination. - Tommy Lasorda
Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing. - Pele
There may be people who have more talent than you, but there’s no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do. - Derek Jeter
Talent is never enough. With few exceptions, the best players are the hardest workers. - Magic Johnson
Success is born out of faith, an undying passion, and a relentless drive. - Stephen Curry
My confidence comes from the daily grind—training my butt off day in and day out. - Hope Solo
The lessons of the sports field prepare you for the game of life. - John Wooden
Sports teaches you character. It teaches you to play by the rules, it teaches you to know what it feels like to win and lose—it teaches you about life. - Billie Jean King
